Detailed Description

Describes the model of an editbox.

Appends an empty line to the end of all lines.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::DeleteChar (  INT  idx = -1  ) 
 

Deletes character, which is under the cursor. For deleting another character, specify idx.

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetLastVisibleLine (   )  const
 

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetLine (  INT  char_idx = -1  )  const
 

Returns the number of the line which contains the cursor. If the number of the line of a character should be returned, specify the index of the character by char_idx.

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetLineIndex (  INT  line  )  const [inline]
 

For the first character in the line line the index related to the text buffer is returned.

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetLineLength (  INT  line  )  const [inline]
 

Returns the length of the line line in characters.

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetMaxTextLength (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the maximum of allowed characters for the text-buffer. Note that the '' is not counted, hence the size of the text-buffer must be max_text_len + 1.

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetNoOfLines (   )  const [inline]
 

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetNoOfVisibleLines (   )  const [inline]

Returns a pointer to the text buffer.

INT AbstractEditBoxModel::GetTextLength (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the length of the text. Note that the '' is not counted.

INT  insert_idx = -1

INT  replace_idx = -1

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetInputValid (  BOOLEAN  input_valid  )  [inline]
 

Indicates that the input is valid, if input_valid is set to TRUE. Whether an input is valid or not, should be decided by the control.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetLineIndex (  INT  line,
INT  index
)  [inline]
 

Sets the start index related to the text buffer for the first character of the line line to index.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetLineLength (  INT  line,
INT  length
)  [inline]
 

Sets the length of the line line in characters. This means that if the index of the first character of the line is e. g. 5 and the length is 3, the characters with the index 5 to 7 are indicessed by the line.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetMaxTextLength (  INT  max_text_len  ) 
 

Sets the maximum of allowed characters for the text-buffer. Note that the '' is not counted, hence the size of the text-buffer must be max_text_len + 1.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetNoOfVisibleLines (  INT  lines  )  [inline]
 

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetPaging (  BOOLEAN  paging  )  [inline]
 

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetPasswordMode (  BOOLEAN  password_mode  )  [inline]
 

Parameters:
password_mode If TRUE, all input characters will be presented with '*'.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetText (  const WCHAR *  text  ) 
 

Sets the text buffer to text.

void AbstractEditBoxModel::SetTextLength (  INT  text_len  ) 
 

Sets the length of the text. Note that the '' is not counted.
